mapper.insert: insert into provider (ID, TYPE, pcode, sname, PROVIDER_INFO, CELLPHONE, LOGIN_ID, PASSWORD, REGION_ID, REGISTER_TIME, STATUS, AUTH_FILE, WEIXIN, QQ, WORK_TIME, EMALL, RECOMMEND, PROVIDER_IMG ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pcode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{providerInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cellphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registerTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{authFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weixin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{emall,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recommend,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{providerImg,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY} )

ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TYPE = #{record.type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pcode = #{record.pcode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sname = #{record.sname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROVIDER_INFO = '${record.providerInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}',

LOGIN_ID = #{record.loginId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PASSWORD = #{record.password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
